evidence.claim: Beam utilizes AWS services including S3 for data storage and Lambda for serverless computing.
The company emphasizes HIPAA compliance in their solutions, indicating adherence to health data regulations.
They implement HL7 FHIR for healthcare data interoperability.
Integration options include REST APIs, allowing for flexible data exchanges.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of sending/receiving X12 or EDI transactions found.
